lead_paragraph: Prabhat Singh was accused of circulating obscene material and arrested after a post criticizing the police and calling for protections for reporters.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; India: A Critic of the Police Is Arrested
headline.main: Journalist Jailed in Eastern India Over Social Media Post

snippet: Prabhat Singh was accused of circulating obscene material and arrested after a post criticizing the police and calling for protections for reporters.
abstract: Journalist Prabhat Singh is arrested in eastern India on charges of circulating obscene material on social media; his posts were critical of police and called for protections for regional journalists.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
